alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:55PM EDT until May 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... West central Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Staunton River State Park, or near Redoak, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chase City around 520 PM EDT. Kells Corner around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fairview, Plantersville, Rogers Corner, Spanish Grove, Fort Mitchell, Finneywood, Skipwith and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
